PlaceholderDesc_Conditions: Array of conditions. Conditions without a child node will be filtered. Can be iterated using for. The properties of the conditions can be found below.
PlaceholderDesc_AllConditions: Array of conditions. Conditions without a child node will be included in this array. Can be iterated using for. The properties of the conditions can be found below.
PlaceholderDesc_Else: Data for the else condition. The properties of the conditions can be found below.
